bibl.title: Tri krestalnikh gimna s alfabitnim akrostikhom. Avec résumé en anglais: Three Baptismal Hymns with Alphabetical Acrostic.
bibl.note: Includes a critical analysis of P. Barc. Inv. 157 a-b [ed.: Ramon ROCA-PUIG, Anàfora de Barcelona i altres pregàries (Missa del segle IV) (Barcelona, 1994) pp. 117-126] and P. Amh. I, 2 (= van Haelst 844). The texts have similar structure connected with the topic of baptism.
bibl.seg: VINOGRADOV A.Yu., Tri krestalnikh gimna s alfabitnim akrostikhom. Avec résumé en anglais: Three Baptismal Hymns with Alphabetical Acrostic.

Includes a critical analysis of P. Barc. Inv. 157 a-b [ed.: Ramon ROCA-PUIG, Anàfora de Barcelona i altres pregàries (Missa del segle IV) (Barcelona, 1994) pp. 117-126] and P. Amh. I, 2 (= van Haelst 844). The texts have similar structure connected with the topic of baptism.
